key.description: the unique key identifying the deployment

deployments.description: a list of deployed resources, e.g. processes

decisionRequirements.description: metadata of a deployed decision requirements

bpmnProcessId.description:
the bpmn process ID, as parsed during deployment; together with the version forms a
unique identifier for a specific process definition

processDefinitionKey.description: the assigned key, which acts as a unique identifier for this process

resourceName.description:
the resource name (see: ProcessRequestObject.name) from which this process was
parsed

dmnDecisionId.description:
the dmn decision ID, as parsed during deployment; together with the
versions forms a unique identifier for a specific decision

dmnDecisionName.description: the dmn name of the decision, as parsed during deployment

decisionKey.description:
the assigned decision key, which acts as a unique identifier for this
decision

dmnDecisionRequirementsId.description:
the dmn ID of the decision requirements graph that this decision is part
of, as parsed during deployment

decisionRequirementsKey.description:
the assigned key of the decision requirements graph that this decision is
part of

dmnDecisionRequirementsId.description:
the dmn decision requirements ID, as parsed during deployment; together
with the versions forms a unique identifier for a specific decision

dmnDecisionRequirementsName.description: the dmn name of the decision requirements, as parsed during deployment

decisionRequirementsKey.description:
the assigned decision requirements key, which acts as a unique identifier
for this decision requirements

resourceName.description:
the resource name (see: Resource.name) from which this decision
requirements was parsed
